snippet: Josh Hart scored 21 points, including back-to-back 3-pointers with 7 minutes left that put the game out of reach, as No. 2 Villanova pulled away to beat Georgetown 81-55 on Saturday....

headline.main: Christopher Bell Finishes Off Dominant Truck Win at Atlanta
headline.print_headline: Christopher Bell Finishes Off Dominant Truck Win at Atlanta

lead_paragraph: Josh Hart scored 21 points, including back-to-back 3-pointers with 7 minutes left that put the game out of reach, as No. 2 Villanova pulled away to beat Georgetown 81-55 on Saturday.
